title: Introducing: Casper Cult
body:
Yet another dreamy, electronic act hailing from Australia, **Casper Cult** jokingly (perhaps) list their influences as La Dispute and Miley Cyrus… Comprised of [Dylan Hill](https://soundcloud.

com/llihnalyd) and a so far anonymous female friend, this is some real nostalgia inducing pop, sounding so sleek and perfectly produced. Put these on a decent sound system, turn it up loud, close your eyes, and hey, maybe summer will arrive a little earlier than expected. Check out Endless Nightmare and Industrial Love below.
